total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 3s in the input grid.
Q2: Replace the identified cells with 3s.

Q8: Replace the identified cells with 1s.
Q1: Identify the pattern of the color changes in the examples.

Q4: Apply the color changes to the identified cells in the input grid of the quiz to generate the output grid.
